main.name: Ketan Mangla
main.occupation: Student and Full Stack Web Developer
main.description: Never hesitating to learn new things and work on novel ideas
main.bio: Hiya, It is Ketan here. I am currently a student pursuing a degree in Computer Science and Engineering. I have acquired many skills along the degree program and through self learning which would be beneficial in the industry. I'm aspiring to work as a Freelancer and apply my skills to make a change in the society.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Once you stop learning, you start dying. Learning new skills and adapting to the changing scenarios has been my forte.

education.description: Along my degree course, I have gathered the theoretical knowledge for a wide range of subjects including but not limited to Computer Networking, Data Structures & Algorithms, Operating Systems, Deep Learning and more.

work.title: Intern Undergraduate
work.description: At my time with Dell, I worked in the Performance Engineering team building automation scripts for UI testing to be deployed on their DevOps pipeline.

work.title: Trainee
work.description: Learning Android Development with the Native Android SDK and Firebase.

projects.title: YelpCamp
projects.category: A Camping Grounds App built with Node, Express, MongoDB, Bootstrap

projects.title: Connect
projects.category: A Mobile Application using Flutter and Firebase

testimonials.text: Working with Ketan was a wonderful experience. He showed dedication towards his work and always was very helpful to everyone.
